name: John Doe
description: My laptop overheats and shuts down after 10 minutes of use. This started happening about a week ago. I've tried cleaning the vents but the problem persists.

name: Jane Smith
description: Unable to connect to the company VPN. I get an error message saying 'Connection timeout' every time I try to connect from home.

name: Bob Johnson
description: My email client keeps crashing when I try to open attachments larger than 5MB. This is affecting my ability to review important documents.
summary: Email client crashes with large attachments.
resolution: Updated email client to latest version and increased attachment size limit in settings.

name: Alice Williams
description: Printer in the 3rd floor office is not responding. The display shows 'Paper Jam' but there is no paper stuck inside.
summary: Printer showing false paper jam error.
resolution: Reset printer sensors and performed firmware update. Issue resolved.

name: Charlie Brown
description: Cannot access the shared network drive. I get 'Access Denied' error even though I had access yesterday. Need urgent access to project files.
